location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Peter Elwin Wrench and Dymoke Lyster, Agent and Council at Bussora [Basra], to Benjamin Jervis, East India Company Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter discusses the mutiny aboard the Islamabadby Arab sailors who murdered its captain and officers and stole the goods on board. The author agrees to send the Tartarto try and retrieve the stolen loot from the village of Magoo [Bandar Moghuyeh] where it is (wrongly) believed to be held. Also reported is a missing bale of Worsters [Worcesters] from the shipment that came on the London.
